com.bmwcarit.barefoot.matcher

Class Matcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bmwcarit.barefoot.markov.Filter<MatcherCandidate,MatcherTransition,MatcherSample>
      • com.bmwcarit.barefoot.matcher.Matcher

  • public class Matcher
extends Filter<MatcherCandidate,MatcherTransition,MatcherSample>
    Matcher filter for Hidden Markov Model (HMM) map matching. It is a HMM filter (@{link Filter}) and determines emission and transition probabilities for map matching with HMM.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Matcher(RoadMap map, Router<Road,RoadPoint> router, Cost<Road> cost, SpatialOperator spatial)
      Creates a HMM map matching filter for some map, router, cost function, and spatial operator.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Matcher

        public Matcher(RoadMap map,
               Router<Road,RoadPoint> router,
               Cost<Road> cost,
               SpatialOperator spatial)
        Creates a HMM map matching filter for some map, router, cost function, and spatial operator.
        Parameters:
        map - RoadMap object of the map to be matched to.
        router - Router object to be used for route estimation.
        cost - Cost function to be used for routing.
        spatial - Spatial operator for spatial calculations.

        Lambda parameter of negative exponential distribution defining transition probabilities.

      • setLambda

        public void setLambda(double lambda)
        Sets lambda parameter of negative exponential distribution defining transition probabilities (default is 0.0). Adaptive parameterization is enabled if lambda is set to 0.0.
        Parameters:
        lambda - Lambda parameter of negative exponential distribution defining transition probabilities.

      • candidates

        protected Set<Tuple<MatcherCandidate,Double>> candidates(Set<MatcherCandidate> predecessors,
                                                         MatcherSample sample)
        Description copied from class: Filter
        Gets state vector, i.e. a set of StateCandidate objects and with its emission probability.
        Specified by:
        candidates in class Filter<MatcherCandidate,MatcherTransition,MatcherSample>
        Parameters:
        predecessors - Predecessor state candidate st-1.
        sample - Measurement sample.
        Returns:
        Set of tuples consisting of a StateCandidate and its emission probability.

      • transition

        protected Tuple<MatcherTransition,Double> transition(Tuple<MatcherSample,MatcherCandidate> predecessor,
                                                     Tuple<MatcherSample,MatcherCandidate> candidate)
        Description copied from class: Filter
        Gets transition and its transition probability for a pair of StateCandidates, i.e. a candidate st and its predecessor st
        Specified by:
        transition in class Filter<MatcherCandidate,MatcherTransition,MatcherSample>
        Parameters:
        predecessor - Tuple of predecessor state candidate st-1 and its respective measurement sample.
        candidate - Tuple of state candidate st and its respective measurement sample.
        Returns:
        Tuple consisting of the transition from st-1 to st and its transition probability, or null if there is no transition.

      • transitions

        protected Map<MatcherCandidate,Map<MatcherCandidate,Tuple<MatcherTransition,Double>>> transitions(Tuple<MatcherSample,Set<MatcherCandidate>> predecessors,
                                                                                                  Tuple<MatcherSample,Set<MatcherCandidate>> candidates)
        Description copied from class: Filter
        Gets transitions and its transition probabilities for each pair of state candidates st and st-1.

        Note: This method may be overridden for better performance, otherwise it defaults to the method Filter.transition(com.bmwcarit.barefoot.util.Tuple<S, C>, com.bmwcarit.barefoot.util.Tuple<S, C>) for each single pair of state candidate and its possible predecessor.

        Overrides:
        transitions in class Filter<MatcherCandidate,MatcherTransition,MatcherSample>
        Parameters:
        predecessors - Tuple of a set of predecessor state candidate st-1 and its respective measurement sample.
        candidates - Tuple of a set of state candidate st and its respective measurement sample.
        Returns:
        Maps each predecessor state candidate st-1 ∈ St-1 to a map of state candidates st ∈ St containing all transitions from st-1 to st and its transition probability, or null if there no transition.

      • mmatch

        public MatcherKState mmatch(List<MatcherSample> samples,
                            double minDistance,
                            int minInterval)
        Matches a full sequence of samples, MatcherSample objects and returns state representation of the full matching which is a KState object.
        Parameters:
        samples - Sequence of samples, MatcherSample objects.
        minDistance - Minimum distance in meters between subsequent samples as criterion to match a sample. (Avoids unnecessary matching where samples are more dense than necessary.)
        minInterval - Minimum time interval in milliseconds between subsequent samples as criterion to match a sample. (Avoids unnecessary matching where samples are more dense than necessary.)
        Returns:
        State representation of the full matching which is a KState object.
